Posts.EditableText: My second game cant publish, and i dont know why.
Posts.HTML: My second game cant publish, and i dont know why.

Posts.EditableText:
Did you start afresh with the second game or did you simply edit an existing one? If you edited an existing one you'll need to generate a new 'Game ID' otherwise it will just over-right the first published game.

Go to 'game' at top of left pane, then click the 'Generate' button at the end of the long code.
Posts.HTML:
Did you start afresh with the second game or did you simply edit an existing one? If you edited an existing one you'll need to generate a new 'Game ID' otherwise it will just over-right the first published game.

Go to 'game' at top of left pane, then click the 'Generate' button at the end of the long code.

Posts.EditableText: If you're offline, go to Tools > Publish.
Posts.HTML: If you're offline, go to Tools > Publish.
